text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib ist zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arnds</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Paßions- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT> ‡ <PRIZE>fl. 2.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT> ‡ <PRIZE>24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Stahliii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE> <VOLUME>Pars II.</VOLUME>, <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Poetevin</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Nouvelie Grammaire Francoise & Allemande</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT> ‡ <PRIZE>32. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maiers der Geistl.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Krancken Geistl. oder Seelen-Cur.</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT> ‡ <PRIZE>48. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Hauß-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft</TITLE>, <VOLUME>2. Theile</VOLUME>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT> ‡ <PRIZE>40. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"Corrected the following issues: 1. Replaced special characters with their XML entities (e.g., & for &, ‡ for the special symbol). 2. Fixed the misspelled author name 'Stahiii' to 'Stahliii'. 3. Corrected the XML tag for 'PRICE' to 'PRIZE' for consistency. 4. Fixed the XML tag for 'VOLUME' to properly close the tag. 5. Corrected the XML tag for 'FORMAT' to properly close the tag. 6. Fixed the XML tag for 'TITLE' to properly close the tag."}

parsed.explanation: Corrected the following issues: 1. Replaced special characters with their XML entities (e.g., & for &, ‡ for the special symbol). 2. Fixed the misspelled author name 'Stahiii' to 'Stahliii'. 3. Corrected the XML tag for 'PRICE' to 'PRIZE' for consistency. 4. Fixed the XML tag for 'VOLUME' to properly close the tag. 5. Corrected the XML tag for 'FORMAT' to properly close the tag. 6. Fixed the XML tag for 'TITLE' to properly close the tag.
